channel.title: mapbox on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in mapbox on Memo Tut

item.title: Introducing the potential of Plotly's scatter plots with practical examples
item.description: Hello! This article is Kaggle's advent calendar, Scatter plot of Python data visualization library “Plotly” I thought that it goes well with competitions such as Kaggle, so I would like to introduce it. First of all, I would like to see a concrete example. Example 1 Plots the word’s distributed representation with 3D compression Example 2 Plot rental data for 23 wards of Tokyo on map data What do you think!
